name: monocle
title: Monocle
description:
Extension to control Monocle 3.0 for macOS

Noise-cancelling for your ï£¿ screen now with cursor shake
author: emlez

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Toggle Overlay
commands.subtitle: Turn overlay on or off
commands.description: Toggle the Monocle overlay on or off

commands.name: toggle-mode
commands.title: Toggle Focus Mode
commands.subtitle: Switch between Ambient and Deep mode
commands.description: Toggle the focus mode between Ambient and Deep

commands.name: ambient
commands.title: Ambient Mode
commands.subtitle: Set focus mode to gradient
commands.description: Set focus mode to Ambient (gradient overlay)

commands.name: deep
commands.title: Deep Focus Mode
commands.subtitle: Set focus mode to fullscreen
commands.description: Set focus mode to Deep (fullscreen overlay)

commands.name: toggle-ignore
commands.title: Toggle App Exclusion
commands.subtitle: Include or exclude current app
commands.description: Toggle the currently focused app in or out of the Monocle ignore list

commands.name: ignore
commands.title: Exclude Current App
commands.subtitle: Add app to ignore list
commands.description: Exclude the currently focused app from Monocle overlay

commands.name: unignore
commands.title: Include Current App
commands.subtitle: Remove app from ignore list
commands.description: Include the currently focused app in Monocle overlay

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
